page.title: 04LEYTONSTONE LIFESTYLES.
page.content: {Leytonstone }has lots of shops,especially food shops. There is a new "Texas-Homecare" Superstore being built to sell hardware,furniture and many things to repair your house with. It is also good for other things like providing employment. People in Leytonstone can enjoy themselves in their spare time because there's a Recreation Centre here. My Mum plays Squash there sometimes and I go swimming. That's one thing that I like about Leytonstone. I'm not so keen on Leytonstone because it's too messy;it's covered with rubbish and nobody seems to pick it up. Leytonstone should have a Cinema because otherwise you have to go right up to London to see a film. Leytonstone has a lot of corner shops which means that shopping can be quick and easy.
